name: Spare Life
description:
You are a lonely dude. You can fix that. You can sacrifice part of your ability to gain the friendship of another.

Use your newfound skills to reach the end!

Controls:

Keyboard and Mouse:

A or D (Left orRight) - Move

Space or W - Jump

Left Mouse - Shoot

Left Shift - Dash

E - Sacrifice

Q - Swap Guns

Switch Pro Controller (if input isn't registering, connect via Bluetooth):

Left Joystick - Move

Left or Right joystick - Aim

Y or Right Trigger - Shoot

Left Trigger - Dash

B - Jump

A - Sacrifice

X - Swap Guns

Best of luck!
